definition: To transfer possession of an item or object to its original owner or rightful recipient, typically after borrowing or using it temporarily. This term is commonly employed when referring to the act of returning something to its rightful place or person.

examples.german: Kannst du mir mein Buch zurückgeben?
examples.english: Can you give me back my book?
I have to return this CD.

examples.german: Bitte geben Sie den Schlüssel zurück.
Er hat mir mein Geld zurückgegeben.
examples.english: He gave me back my money.

examples.german: Sie müssen die Ware innerhalb von 14 Tagen zurückgeben.
examples.english: You must return the goods within 14 days.
